author: Steve "StevenL"

review: Great product at a great price. You will find yourself hard pressed to find a streaming device that can do as much as this device at this price point. It will do Pandora, HBO GO, Hulu Plus, Netflix, Youtube, Google Play Movies, Google Play Music, and last but not least cast a chrome browser to the TV.The product is very simple to setup and takes maybe 10 minutes. Use the chromecast app on your mobile device to setup works great. For Netflix I find that it has the best way to search movies if you use the phone app for Netflix select movie you want the play to chromecast device. Much better than clunky blue-ray interfaces! Same with youtube, it is so easy to search on mobile device then just select cast to device! I imagine as time goes we will get much more app support.I use mine plugged into my AV Receiver powered by receiver usb port and it works wonderfully.
